neg review: Kitchen closed too early in the evening

pos review: Location very nice and it was quirky .
neg review: It is much more run down than in the photos, it is very "tired",  worn carpets etc . Needs a lot of money spending in it . We were misled by the pictures they must be very old. Totally not value for money. We paid 95 Euros and it was no where near that standard.

pos review: Nice big breakfast. The staff is very helpfull. Grat location situated on the edge of the town, at a walking distance to the centre and duper market.
neg review: There is a private parking place but no ev charging. If you drive an electric vehicle be aware if this. The owner iffered to call another place to charge the car but this was not necessary.

pos review: Very nice rooms and beautiful views over the city. Good breakfast.
The  view from the window was superb
neg review: Tierd looking and a touch cluttered

pos review: The view from the room was amazing, and the hygiene in the ensuite was really good.
neg review: Decoration of the breakfast area was a lot/slightly outdated, and the extend of available savory foods was minimum. Nevertheless it was a relaxing start of the day.

pos review: Quirky Hotel with spectacular views across the town. Old hunting lodge style decoration. It set our holiday off to a great start.
